laboratory_examinations.findings: Avid F-18 FDG uptake in pulmonary lesions (max SUV 26.85), abdominal mass (5/H110036 cm, SUV 24.91), and multiple smaller mesenteric nodules with significant metabolic activity.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Second PET/CT scan 2 months later showed regression of all lesions, with the large abdominal lesion having an SUV of 3.57.
